item.title: Dangerous junction, 21st November
item.description:
I use this road daily and you have to edge out of the road to see if any traffic is coming, because otherwise you cannot see the traffic coming from the left if you are turning right or going straight over the junction. I have had abuse twice for edging out to see what was coming and today I almost got hit by a speeding large van. Its very scary and makes the junction very dangerous. Please could you put a mirror or something so you can see what is coming left
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
